index.html.title: RiotPls for .NET | RiotPls Documentation
index.html.keywords: RiotPls for .NET A .NET Core 3.1 library for the Riot Games API. Introduction RiotPls is an asynchronous .NET Core 3.1 library for the Riot Games APIs. Features Supports League of Legends, Teamfight Tactics, Legends of Runeterra, and Data Dragon. Currently in an early stage of development, with some features fully functional.
